article.title: What our price includes
article.label: Prices
article.description: Price per hour includes direct and indirect expenses and is the only monetary value used for project cost calculation.
article.keywords: price per hour, ROM estimate, budget, project price, software development price

text.p: We only work with fixed-price contracts. Staff-hours are used to calculate the price. The Budget is the amount of required staff-hours multiplied by the price of one staff-hour.

The price per staff-hour includes direct expenses, indirect expenses, and our profit. Depending on the size of the project and cost of technical specialists' efforts price per hour may vary in interval between $25 and $60.

ul.li: Salary and bonuses of project manager;
Our expenses for project management software development;
Mistakes in estimates that may result in project cost overrun;

text.p: You approve a Budget as the fixed amount of staff-hours and monetary value required to complete the project. The Budget is never changed if scope of the work is not changed.

concepts.c4: Budget is a final estimate of the project size and price
